author: Tony O'Donoghue
title: Spotlight now on Kenny as McCarthy exits stage left
description: RTÉ Soccer correspondent Tony O'Donoghue reflects on Mick McCarthy's magnanimous departure from his Republic of Ireland post and looks ahead to what faces new manager Stephen Kenny.
content:
Last week, after UEFA deferred the Euro 2020 play-offs indefinitely, we asked a question of the FAI. 
If, as we understood, the FAI was contractually obliged to give Stephen Kenny the top job by the agreed date of 1 August then the association had a problem.… [+6310 chars]
